{{flavour|The hide of a pearl dragon, covered in iridescent nacreous scales. In its raw form it does not provide much protection, but by magical means it may be used to make excellent armour.}}

'''Pearl dragon hide''' is a fairly unimpressive piece of body [[armour]], inferior to [[leather armour]] and providing no special resistances. However, you can upgrade it to an impressive suit of [[pearl dragon armour]] by [[scroll of enchant armour|enchanting]] it, improving its [[AC]] tremendously and adding a rank of [[negative energy resistance]]. Although these hides are extremely rare, you can also produce them by butchering an (equally rare and rather dangerous) [[pearl dragon]]'s [[corpse]].

==History==
*Pearl dragon hides were removed in [[0.19]].
*Pearl dragon hides were added in [[0.8]].
